Sweden: Charles XII crosses the Vistula, initiating the Swedish invasion of Russia.
Russia: Bulavin Rebellion: After a series of devastating military reversals, Bulavin was shot by his former followers.
An imperial decree divided Muscovy into eight guberniyas (governorates).
India: Guru Granth Sahib becomes Guru of Sikhs.
Estonia: Fearful of Swedish attack, Russians burned down the city of Tartu.
